official_title: A bill to transfer the authority of the Secretary of Transportation under the Act commonly known as the Truman-Hobbs Act to the Secretary of the Army.

summary.as: Reported to House amended, Part I
summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 97-787 (Part I)) Transfers the authority of the Secretary of Transportation under the Truman-Hobbs Act regarding the alteration of certain bridges over navigable waters to the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers. Repeals provisions of the Department of Transportation Act to conform with this Act.

titles.title: A bill to transfer the authority of the Secretary of Transportation under the Act commonly known as the Truman-Hobbs Act to the Secretary of the Army.
